Description: Stores customer information, including contact details, address, credit limit, and sales representative.
Contains employee data, such as names, extensions, email addresses, job titles, and office codes.
Holds office information, including city, phone number, address, state, country, and postal code.
Records order details, including product codes, quantities, prices, and line numbers.
Stores order information, including order dates, required dates, shipped dates, status, and customer numbers.
Tracks payment details, including check numbers, payment dates, and amounts.
Describes product lines, with text and HTML descriptions, and optional images.
Contains product data, including product codes, names, scales, vendors, descriptions, stock quantities, buy prices, and MSRP.
